alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fentress; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cumberland, Van Buren, northeastern Warren, southeastern White, southeastern Putnam and south central Fentress Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Fairfield Glade to 8 miles east of McMinnville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Crossville, Sparta, Spencer, Fairfield Glade, Crab Orchard, Pleasant Hill, Doyle, Cumberland Mountain State Park, Slate Springs, Virgin Falls State Natural Area, Lake Tansi, Fall Creek Falls State Park, Indian Rock Lake and Clarkrange. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 307 and 331. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Fentress; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White
